mapper.sql: t.*, linkman.id as "linkMan.id", linkman.name as "linkMan.name", wayDict.id as "wayDict.id", wayDict.name as "wayDict.name", wayDict.code as "wayDict.code", phaseDict.id as "phaseDict.id", phaseDict.name as "phaseDict.name", phaseDict.code as "phaseDict.code"
LEFT JOIN tkl_customer_linkman linkman ON linkman.id = t.linkman_id LEFT JOIN tkl_dict_item wayDict ON wayDict.id = t.dict_way_id LEFT JOIN tkl_dict_item phaseDict ON phaseDict.id = t.dict_phase_id
mapper.select:
select
from tkl_customer_follow_record t
WHERE 1=1 AND t.sale_chance_id = #{saleChance.id} AND t.team_id = #{saleChance.teamId} AND t.del_flag = 0 order by contact_date desc limit 1
